content:
The Election Compass works by comparing the opinions you enter to those given by {candidatePlural} and {partyPlural}. The results are given a match score, which is the percentage of how closely you agree with them.

  • A score of 100 means that you agree completely on all the questions you have answered.
  • A score of 0 means that you disagree on all of the questions.
  • A score between these two extremes means you agree on some questions and disagree on others.

organizationMatching.content:
{partyMatchingMethod, select, answersOnly {

The electoral alliance results have been calculated based on the answers provided by the electoral alliances.

} imputed {

The electoral alliance results have been calculated based on their provided answers or, if a electoral alliance has not answered the questions, from the mode or median of its candidates' responses in the constituency.

} other {

The electoral alliance results have been calculated based on their provided answers or, if a electoral alliance has not answered the questions, based on the responses of its candidates in the constituency.

}} {partyMatchingMethod, select, answersOnly {} other {

Note that a electoral alliance's candidates may disagree with their electoral alliance on certain issues, so this calculated stance may not fully represent the electoral alliance's official position.

}}
organizationMatching.title: Electoral alliance Matching
